summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PocketQuest financial literacy platform. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend landing page loads correctly with all sections visible. AI integration with Claude Sonnet 4.5 is working perfectly. Authentication flow has integration issues preventing full frontend testing.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication flow not working - /dashboard redirects to landing page despite valid session cookie

passed_tests: ✅ All 20 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
✅ Wallet operations (get accounts, transfer money, transactions)
✅ Store operations (get items, purchase, purchase history)
✅ AI Chat functionality with Claude Sonnet 4.5
✅ Landing page loads with all sections visible
✅ All navigation buttons and CTAs present
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication flow - the ProtectedRoute component is not properly handling session cookies, causing /dashboard and other protected routes to redirect to landing page. The backend session validation works correctly, but frontend-backend integration needs debugging. Check cookie domain settings and axios configuration.
